summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Stock Steering Wheels feature and Mobile Order Modal improvements. All backend API tests passed (12/12). UI tests confirmed: Stock Inventory page has working tabs for Rims and Steering Wheels, Add Steering Wheel form works correctly, and Mobile Order Modal action buttons are compact (icon-only, ~32-34px wide) fitting within 375px mobile viewport.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed (minor)

passed_tests: Health check endpoint - /api/health returns healthy status
Admin login with credentials digitalebookdepot@gmail.com / Admin123!
GET /api/stock-steering-wheels - returns list of steering wheels
POST /api/stock-steering-wheels - creates new steering wheel with SKU and Brand
GET /api/stock-steering-wheels - verifies created wheel appears in list
PUT /api/stock-steering-wheels/{id} - updates steering wheel (cubby_number, notes)
POST /api/stock-steering-wheels/{id}/create-order - creates order from stock wheel and marks as sold
Steering wheel status changes to 'sold' after order creation
DELETE /api/stock-steering-wheels/{id} - deletes steering wheel
DELETE /api/stock-steering-wheels/{fake_id} - returns 404 for non-existent
POST /api/stock-steering-wheels - validates required fields (brand)
GET /api/stock-inventory - returns stock rims list
UI - Stock Inventory page loads with tabs
UI - 'Stock Rims' tab visible with data-testid='rims-tab'
UI - 'Steering Wheels' tab visible with data-testid='steering-wheels-tab'
UI - Clicking Steering Wheels tab shows steering wheels section
UI - 'Add Steering Wheel' button visible with data-testid='add-steering-wheel-btn'
UI - Add Steering Wheel modal opens with form fields (SKU, Brand, Model, Finish, etc.)
UI - Form fields have correct data-testid attributes (wheel-sku-input, wheel-brand-input, submit-wheel-btn)
UI - Submitting form creates steering wheel and shows success toast
UI - Mobile Order Modal fits within 375px viewport (modal width: 356.25px)
UI - Mobile action buttons are compact (icon-only, ~32-34px wide each)
UI - 5 action buttons visible on mobile: Hold, RUSH, Refinish, Fulfilled, Edit
UI - Action button text labels hidden on mobile (sm:hidden class working)
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: DialogContent components missing aria-describedby for accessibility - consider adding description or aria-describedby prop
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up test steering wheels (TEST-SW-001, UI-TEST-SW-001) during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Stock Steering Wheels feature fully tested and working: 1) Stock Inventory page at /stock-inventory has two tabs - 'Stock Rims' and 'Steering Wheels', 2) Steering Wheels tab shows list of stock steering wheels with Edit/Sell/Delete buttons, 3) Add Steering Wheel button opens modal with form (SKU*, Brand*, Model, Finish, Original Order #, Cubby #, Notes), 4) Sell button creates order from stock wheel and marks it as sold, 5) Mobile Order Modal action buttons are now compact (icon-only on mobile, ~32-34px wide) and fit within 375px viewport without horizontal scrolling. Key test IDs: rims-tab, steering-wheels-tab, add-steering-wheel-btn, wheel-sku-input, wheel-brand-input, submit-wheel-btn.
